name: Crypt of Doom
description:
Resurrect as a ghost and crawl through a randomly generated level and escape by upgrading yourself using body parts.

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Tap/Hold H - Shoot or charge attacks

J - Interact with grave to dig up upgrade

W/Up - Continue in menus

Hold M - Map

Upgrades

Head - Increases attack charge speed

Hand - Decreases attack cooldown

Torso - +1 Max HP

Foot - Increases move speed
